metadata.description: It is the year 3000, and the Batman of that era lies dead. Civilization's only remaining hope against the threat of the group known as the Skulp resides in the boy who survives the Dark Knight...if he can only prevail where his mentor failed. What will the Earth of 3000 A.D. be like...and how will its heroes cope with the otherworldly threats confronting it? ROBIN 3000 is the first Robin Elseworlds story, and the first Elseworlds story in two parts.
metadata.name: Robin 3000
